# K-Means Clustering

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(cluster)
library(factoextra)

df <- read.csv("sample data/health_facilities.csv")

features <- df %>% select(patients_per_day, doctors)
scaled <- scale(features)
set.seed(123)
km <- kmeans(scaled, centers = 3, nstart = 25)

fviz_cluster(km, data = scaled)
```
